name: ERS Eco CO2
description: ERS Eco CO2 is a LoRaWANÂ® temperature, humidity, and CO2 sensor for the indoor environment. This sensor is your environmentally friendly option, with an organic solar cell as the only power source and an enclosure made from biodegradable material. Removing batteries from a wireless IoT device significantly reduces the environmental impact and maintenance costs.
author: Akenza AG
